import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" import "../node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.css" import { list } from "./API"; import { Recruite } from "./NewResource"; import { Read } from "./Read"; export const Home=()=>{ const[tmpArray,setTmpArray]=useState([]) const[createView,setCreateView]=useState(false) const hello=()=>{ setTmpArray(list()) } useEffect(()=>{ hello() },[]) return( <>
{/* */} {(createView)? <> : <>
{tmpArray.map((ele)=>( ))}
